summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Farmers Market Tax Increment Financing (TIF) District Board of Directors will convene on December 11, 2023, at 11:00 a.m. at Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room, with a videoconference option available. The meeting aims to review and make decisions on key administrative matters related to the TIF District.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to order and introduction of participants.
2. Public comments on agenda items 3-5.
3. Review and approval of the Meeting Record from December 12, 2022.
4. Review and approval of the Farmers Market TIF District Annual Report for FY 2022-2023, with a recommendation to forward it to the City Council.
5. Review and approval of the regular meeting schedule for the Farmers Market TIF District Board for 2024.

**Important Details**:  
The annual report will summarize the financial and operational performance of the TIF District over the past fiscal year. The meeting will also establish the schedule for future meetings, ensuring ongoing governance and oversight of the TIF District activities.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the meeting record, the annual report, and the proposed 2024 meeting schedule. Public comments will be taken into account before these decisions are finalized.
